DOC.brief_summary: Primary objective: safety and tolerability of BI 10773 in male and female patients with type 2 diabetes Secondary objective: pharmacokinetics and pharmacodynamics of BI 10773
DOC.brief_title: 4 Week Treatment With Three Oral Doses of BI 10773 in Patients With Type 2 Diabetes
DOC.criteria: Male and postmenopausal or hysterectomised female patients with type 2 diabetes Age >18 and < 70 years BMI >18.5 and <40 kg/m2 Antidiabetic treatment with insulin or glitazones or with more than one oral hypoglycaemic agent; Fasted blood glucose > 240 mg/dl (>13.3 mmol/L) or a blood glucose level above 400 mg/dl (22.2 mmol/L) postprandially; HbA1c > 8.5 %
